thread.title: Joanne Armstrong
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Joanne Armstrong

author: Joanne Armstrong
title: Joanne Armstrong
text: So nice, helpful, efficient ladies in the Warwick office. Very pleasant and quiet office. I have had great experience in the last 4 years.
